com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable, com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Layout, IUIElement
public class SeqMultiChoiceSelector extends UIMultiChoice
A multi choice selector that allows the user to cycle through the choices via ArrowButton.
